greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Self-inverse permutation of natural numbers induced by Catalan Automorphism *A072797 acting on the parenthesizations encoded by A014486.
comment: This automorphism effects the following transformation on the unlabeled rooted plane binary trees (letters A, B, C refer to arbitrary subtrees located on those nodes and () stands for an implied terminal node).
In terms of S-expressions, this automorphism swaps cdar and cdr of an S-exp if its car-element is not ().
See the Karttunen OEIS-Wiki link for a detailed explanation of how to obtain a given integer sequence from this definition.
link: Index entries for signature-permutations induced by Catalan automorphisms
program: (Scheme function implementing this automorphism on list-structures/S-expressions, both constructive (*A072797) and destructive (*A072797!) version:)(define (*A072797 s) (if (and (pair? s) (pair? (car s))) (cons (cons (caar s) (cdr s)) (cdar s)) s))
(define (*A072797! s) (cond ((not (pair? s)) s) ((not (pair? (car s))) s) (else (swap! s) (robl! s) (swap! (car s)) s)))
(define (robl! s) (let ((ex-car (car s))) (set-car! s (cddr s)) (set-cdr! (cdr s) ex-car) (swap! (cdr s)) (swap! s) s))
(define (swap! s) (let ((ex-car (car s))) (set-car! s (cdr s)) (set-cdr! s ex-car) s))
xref: Row 8 of A089840. A left/right-flipped conjugate of A072796, i.e. A072797(n) = A057163(A072796(A057163(n))). Counts for fixed points and counts for distinct cycles (in each range limited by A014137 and A014138) are given in A073190 and A073191.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 12 2002
ext: Further comments and constructive implementation of Scheme-function (*A072797) added by _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 04 2011
